AUTHOR: Taylor Petrychyn
INSTALL_MSG: MarkovChain will now keep track of how often you use words and use that to generate sentences.
NAME: MarkovChain
SHORT: Creates sentences based on what you've said in the past
DESCRIPTION:
Uses the Markov Chain algorithm to determine your channels sentence patterns.
    When you send a message it adds each word to a dictionary with what word comes over and it's amount used.
    It then uses this data to create new sentences based on words and phrases you have used in the past.
